data.title: 2008 Sussex Skyhawks minor league baseball Roster on StatsCrew.com
data.meta_description: 2008 Sussex Skyhawks minor league baseball roster from your Stats Crew.
data.text:
2008 Sussex Skyhawks Roster

Canadian-American Association (CAA) - Independent

Team Record: 52-42

Finished 3rd in the CAA

Manager: Hal Lanier (52-42)

Location: Augusta, New Jersey

Ballpark: Skylands Stadium

Attendance: 80,500, Avg. 1,713 in 47 home dates

2008 Sussex Skyhawks Statistics

Playoffs - Sussex Skyhawks 3 games, Worcester Tornadoes 1

Finals - Sussex Skyhawks 3 games, Quebec Capitales 0

The Sussex Skyhawks of the Canadian-American Association ended the 2008 season with a record of 52 wins and 42 losses, finishing third in the CAA.

The Skyhawks scored 502 runs and allowed 502 runs. Matt Weston led Sussex with 22 home runs and drove in 60 runs. Chris Brown paced all regular hitters by hitting .316. Kyle Ruwe topped the squad with 12 wins, while Craig Snipp recorded a 3.95 ERA, best among qualifying pitchers.

Yohanny Valera and Walter Young both played in Major League Baseball during their careers.

Hal Lanier served as manager.

Click on column headings to sort.

Average attendance is based upon the number of actual home dates where known (most leagues from 1992 and later). Where the number of home dates is not known, the average is calculated using half the team's total games.
